description: This table stores billing diagnoses associated with a charge entered at end exam (from the related multiple Charge Billing Diagnoses (I ORD 52407) item).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated charge in this billing diagnosis record. Together with ORDER_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ORD_PROC_CHG_EAPS table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple billing diagnoses that are associated with the charge and the order id from the ORD_PROC_CHG_EAPS table.

columns.name: CHARGE_DIAGNOSES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing diagnoses for charges entered when ending an exam.
